name: Mascless Origins
description:
This contains extreme gore and blood and horror elements, flashing lights.

In the SCP universe specifically When day breaks and the 610 universe a Man with a split masc (It's meant to be spelt like this) roams around parallel dimensions to terrorize.

Controls:

WASD to walk, Middle mouse to scroll through tools or zoom... Not all game modes have jumping (Spacebar)

Content relating to the SCP Foundation, including the SCP Foundation logo, is licensed under Creative Commons Sharealike 3.0 and all concepts originate from https://scpwiki.com/ and its authors. Mascless Origins, being derived from this content, is hereby also released under Creative Commons Sharealike 3.0.
